manager.name: SPRIDEN
manager.defaultWhereClause: WHERE ((spriden_id LIKE :GLOBAL_SEARCH_ID AND :GLOBAL_SEARCH_ID IS NOT NULL) OR :GLOBAL_SEARCH_ID IS NULL) AND (((soundex(spriden_last_name) = soundex(:SOUNDEX_LAST_NAME)) AND :SOUNDEX_LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL) OR (spriden_search_last_name LIKE :GLOBAL_LAST_NAME AND :GLOBAL_LAST_NAME IS NOT NULL) OR (:GLOBAL_LAST_NAME IS NULL AND :SOUNDEX_LAST_NAME IS NULL)) AND (((soundex(spriden_first_name) = soundex(:SOUNDEX_FIRST_NAME)) AND :SOUNDEX_FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL) OR (spriden_search_first_name LIKE :GLOBAL_FIRST_NAME AND :GLOBAL_FIRST_NAME IS NOT NULL) OR (:GLOBAL_FIRST_NAME IS NULL AND :SOUNDEX_FIRST_NAME IS NULL)) AND ((spriden_search_mi LIKE :GLOBAL_MID_NAME AND :GLOBAL_MID_NAME IS NOT NULL) OR :GLOBAL_MID_NAME IS NULL) AND spriden_entity_ind = 'P'
manager.defaultOrderByClause: order by spriden_last_name, spriden_first_name, spriden_mi, spriden_id, spriden_change_ind, spriden_activity_date
